title: Tale of a TV mouse
brief_description: The story of a puppet mouse named Lucille, whose entire life revolves around the television. Shows how it affects her life and what finally happens to convince her to break the TV habit. Presents the problems of habitual TV viewing and provides positive alternatives for children who watch a lot of TV.
